      • listSharedLinks

        public DbxSharing.ListSharedLinksResult listSharedLinks()
                                                 throws DbxSharing.ListSharedLinksException,
                                                        DbxException
        List shared links of this user. If no path is given or the path is empty, returns a list of all shared links for the current user. If a non-empty path is given, returns a list of all shared links that allow access to the given path - direct links to the given path and links to parent folders of the given path.
        Throws:
        DbxSharing.ListSharedLinksException
        DbxException

      • listSharedLinksBuilder

        public DbxSharing.ListSharedLinksBuilder listSharedLinksBuilder()
        List shared links of this user. If no path is given or the path is empty, returns a list of all shared links for the current user. If a non-empty path is given, returns a list of all shared links that allow access to the given path - direct links to the given path and links to parent folders of the given path.

      • modifySharedLinkSettings

        public DbxSharing.SharedLinkMetadata modifySharedLinkSettings(String url,
                                                              DbxSharing.SharedLinkSettings settings)
                                                       throws DbxSharing.ModifySharedLinkSettingsException,
                                                              DbxException
        Modify the shared link's settings. If the requested visibility conflict with the shared links policy of the team or the shared folder (in case the linked file is part of a shared folder) then the DbxSharing.LinkPermissions.resolvedVisibility of the returned DbxSharing.SharedLinkMetadata will reflect the actual visibility of the shared link and the DbxSharing.LinkPermissions.requestedVisibility will reflect the requested visibility.
        Parameters:
        settings - Set of settings for the shared link. settings must not be null.
        url - URL of the shared link to change its settings. url must not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.ModifySharedLinkSettingsException
        DbxException

      • createSharedLinkWithSettings

        public DbxSharing.SharedLinkMetadata createSharedLinkWithSettings(String path)
                                                           throws DbxSharing.CreateSharedLinkWithSettingsException,
                                                                  DbxException
        Create a shared link with custom settings. If no settings are given then the default visibility is DbxSharing.RequestedVisibility.public_() (The resolved visibility, though, may depend on other aspects such as team and shared folder settings).
        Parameters:
        path - The path to be shared by the shared link. path must match pattern "((/|id:).*)|(rev:[0-9a-f]{9,})" and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.CreateSharedLinkWithSettingsException
        DbxException

      • createSharedLinkWithSettings

        public DbxSharing.SharedLinkMetadata createSharedLinkWithSettings(String path,
                                                                  DbxSharing.SharedLinkSettings settings)
                                                           throws DbxSharing.CreateSharedLinkWithSettingsException,
                                                                  DbxException
        Create a shared link with custom settings. If no settings are given then the default visibility is DbxSharing.RequestedVisibility.public_() (The resolved visibility, though, may depend on other aspects such as team and shared folder settings).
        Parameters:
        settings - The requested settings for the newly created shared link.
        path - The path to be shared by the shared link. path must match pattern "((/|id:).*)|(rev:[0-9a-f]{9,})" and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.CreateSharedLinkWithSettingsException
        DbxException

      • revokeSharedLink

        public void revokeSharedLink(String url)
                      throws DbxSharing.RevokeSharedLinkException,
                             DbxException
        Revoke a shared link. Note that even after revoking a shared link to a file, the file may be accessible if there are shared links leading to any of the file parent folders. To list all shared links that enable access to a specific file, you can use the listSharedLinksBuilder() with the file as the DbxSharing.ListSharedLinksArg.path argument.
        Parameters:
        url - URL of the shared link. url must not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.RevokeSharedLinkException
        DbxException

      • getSharedLinks

        public DbxSharing.GetSharedLinksResult getSharedLinks()
                                               throws DbxSharing.GetSharedLinksException,
                                                      DbxException
        Returns a list of DbxSharing.LinkMetadata objects for this user, including collection links. If no path is given or the path is empty, returns a list of all shared links for the current user, including collection links. If a non-empty path is given, returns a list of all shared links that allow access to the given path. Collection links are never returned in this case. Note that the url field in the response is never the shortened URL.
        Throws:
        DbxSharing.GetSharedLinksException
        DbxException

      • getSharedLinks

        public DbxSharing.GetSharedLinksResult getSharedLinks(String path)
                                               throws DbxSharing.GetSharedLinksException,
                                                      DbxException
        Returns a list of DbxSharing.LinkMetadata objects for this user, including collection links. If no path is given or the path is empty, returns a list of all shared links for the current user, including collection links. If a non-empty path is given, returns a list of all shared links that allow access to the given path. Collection links are never returned in this case. Note that the url field in the response is never the shortened URL.
        Parameters:
        path - See getSharedLinks(String) description.
        Throws:
        DbxSharing.GetSharedLinksException
        DbxException

      • createSharedLink

        public DbxSharing.PathLinkMetadata createSharedLink(String path)
                                             throws DbxSharing.CreateSharedLinkException,
                                                    DbxException
        Create a shared link. If a shared link already exists for the given path, that link is returned. Note that in the returned DbxSharing.PathLinkMetadata, the DbxSharing.LinkMetadata.url field is the shortened URL if DbxSharing.CreateSharedLinkArg.shortUrl argument is set to true. Previously, it was technically possible to break a shared link by moving or renaming the corresponding file or folder. In the future, this will no longer be the case, so your app shouldn't rely on this behavior. Instead, if your app needs to revoke a shared link, use revokeSharedLink(String).
        Parameters:
        path - The path to share. path must not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.CreateSharedLinkException
        DbxException

      • createSharedLinkBuilder

        public DbxSharing.CreateSharedLinkBuilder createSharedLinkBuilder(String path)
        Create a shared link. If a shared link already exists for the given path, that link is returned. Note that in the returned DbxSharing.PathLinkMetadata, the DbxSharing.LinkMetadata.url field is the shortened URL if DbxSharing.CreateSharedLinkArg.shortUrl argument is set to true. Previously, it was technically possible to break a shared link by moving or renaming the corresponding file or folder. In the future, this will no longer be the case, so your app shouldn't rely on this behavior. Instead, if your app needs to revoke a shared link, use revokeSharedLink(String).
        Parameters:
        path - The path to share. path must not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.

      • listFolders

        public DbxSharing.ListFoldersResult listFolders()
                                         throws DbxSharing.ListFoldersException,
                                                DbxException
        Return the list of all shared folders the current user has access to. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Throws:
        DbxSharing.ListFoldersException
        DbxException

      • listFoldersContinue

        public DbxSharing.ListFoldersResult listFoldersContinue(String cursor)
                                                 throws DbxSharing.ListFoldersContinueException,
                                                        DbxException
        Once a cursor has been retrieved from listFolders(), use this to paginate through all shared folders. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        cursor - The cursor returned by your last call to listFolders() or listFoldersContinue(String). cursor must not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.ListFoldersContinueException
        DbxException

                                                  throws DbxSharing.GetFolderMetadataException,
                                                         DbxException

        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID for the shared folder. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.GetFolderMetadataException
        DbxException

        DbxException

      • shareFolder

        public DbxSharing.ShareFolderLaunch shareFolder(String path)
                                         throws DbxSharing.ShareFolderException,
                                                DbxException
        Share a folder with collaborators. Most sharing will be completed synchronously. Large folders will be completed asynchronously. To make testing the async case repeatable, set `ShareFolderArg.force_async`. If a DbxSharing.ShareFolderLaunch.asyncJobId(java.lang.String) is returned, you'll need to call checkShareJobStatus(String) until the action completes to get the metadata for the folder. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the folder to share. If it does not exist, then a new one is created. path must match pattern "/.*" and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.ShareFolderException
        DbxException

      • shareFolderBuilder

        public DbxSharing.ShareFolderBuilder shareFolderBuilder(String path)
        Share a folder with collaborators. Most sharing will be completed synchronously. Large folders will be completed asynchronously. To make testing the async case repeatable, set `ShareFolderArg.force_async`. If a DbxSharing.ShareFolderLaunch.asyncJobId(java.lang.String) is returned, you'll need to call checkShareJobStatus(String) until the action completes to get the metadata for the folder. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the folder to share. If it does not exist, then a new one is created. path must match pattern "/.*" and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.

      • checkShareJobStatus

        public DbxSharing.ShareFolderJobStatus checkShareJobStatus(String asyncJobId)
                                                    throws DbxSharing.CheckShareJobStatusException,
                                                           DbxException
        Returns the status of an asynchronous job for sharing a folder. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        asyncJobId - Id of the asynchronous job. This is the value of a response returned from the method that launched the job. asyncJobId must have length of at least 1 and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.CheckShareJobStatusException
        DbxException

      • checkJobStatus

        public DbxSharing.JobStatus checkJobStatus(String asyncJobId)
                                    throws DbxSharing.CheckJobStatusException,
                                           DbxException
        Returns the status of an asynchronous job. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        asyncJobId - Id of the asynchronous job. This is the value of a response returned from the method that launched the job. asyncJobId must have length of at least 1 and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.CheckJobStatusException
        DbxException

      • unshareFolder

        public DbxAsync.LaunchEmptyResult unshareFolder(String sharedFolderId,
                                                boolean leaveACopy)
                                         throws DbxSharing.UnshareFolderException,
                                                DbxException
        Allows a shared folder owner to unshare the folder. You'll need to call checkJobStatus(String) to determine if the action has completed successfully. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID for the shared folder. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        leaveACopy - If true, members of this shared folder will get a copy of this folder after it's unshared. Otherwise, it will be removed from their Dropbox. The current user, who is an owner, will always retain their copy.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.UnshareFolderException
        DbxException

      • transferFolder

        public void transferFolder(String sharedFolderId,
                           String toDropboxId)
                    throws DbxSharing.TransferFolderException,
                           DbxException
        Transfer ownership of a shared folder to a member of the shared folder. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID for the shared folder. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        toDropboxId - A account or team member ID to transfer ownership to. toDropboxId must have length of at least 1 and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.TransferFolderException
        DbxException

      • addFolderMember

        public void addFolderMember(String sharedFolderId,
                            List<DbxSharing.AddMember> members)
                     throws DbxSharing.AddFolderMemberException,
                            DbxException
        Allows an owner or editor (if the ACL update policy allows) of a shared folder to add another member. For the new member to get access to all the functionality for this folder, you will need to call mountFolder(String) on their behalf. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID for the shared folder. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        members - The intended list of members to add. Added members will receive invites to join the shared folder. members must not contain a null item and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.AddFolderMemberException
        DbxException

      • addFolderMemberBuilder

        public DbxSharing.AddFolderMemberBuilder addFolderMemberBuilder(String sharedFolderId,
                                                                List<DbxSharing.AddMember> members)
        Allows an owner or editor (if the ACL update policy allows) of a shared folder to add another member. For the new member to get access to all the functionality for this folder, you will need to call mountFolder(String) on their behalf. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID for the shared folder. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        members - The intended list of members to add. Added members will receive invites to join the shared folder. members must not contain a null item and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.

      • removeFolderMember

        public DbxAsync.LaunchEmptyResult removeFolderMember(String sharedFolderId,
                                                     DbxSharing.MemberSelector member,
                                                     boolean leaveACopy)
                                              throws DbxSharing.RemoveFolderMemberException,
                                                     DbxException
        Allows an owner or editor (if the ACL update policy allows) of a shared folder to remove another member. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID for the shared folder. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        leaveACopy - If true, the removed user will keep their copy of the folder after it's unshared, assuming it was mounted. Otherwise, it will be removed from their Dropbox. Also, this must be set to false when kicking a group.
        member - The member to remove from the folder. member must not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.RemoveFolderMemberException
        DbxException

      • updateFolderMember

        public void updateFolderMember(String sharedFolderId,
                               DbxSharing.MemberSelector member,
                               DbxSharing.AccessLevel accessLevel)
                        throws DbxSharing.UpdateFolderMemberException,
                               DbxException
        Allows an owner or editor of a shared folder to update another member's permissions. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID for the shared folder. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        accessLevel - The new access level for member. DbxSharing.AccessLevel.owner() is disallowed. accessLevel must not be null.
        member - The member of the shared folder to update. Only the DbxSharing.MemberSelector.dropboxId(java.lang.String) may be set at this time. member must not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.UpdateFolderMemberException
        DbxException

      • mountFolder

        public DbxSharing.SharedFolderMetadata mountFolder(String sharedFolderId)
                                            throws DbxSharing.MountFolderException,
                                                   DbxException
        The current user mounts the designated folder. Mount a shared folder for a user after they have been added as a member. Once mounted, the shared folder will appear in their Dropbox. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID of the shared folder to mount. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.MountFolderException
        DbxException

      • unmountFolder

        public void unmountFolder(String sharedFolderId)
                   throws DbxSharing.UnmountFolderException,
                          DbxException
        The current user unmounts the designated folder. They can re-mount the folder at a later time using mountFolder(String). Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID for the shared folder. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.UnmountFolderException
        DbxException

      • relinquishFolderMembership

        public void relinquishFolderMembership(String sharedFolderId)
                                throws DbxSharing.RelinquishFolderMembershipException,
                                       DbxException
        The current user relinquishes their membership in the designated shared folder and will no longer have access to the folder. A folder owner cannot relinquish membership in their own folder. Apps must have full Dropbox access to use this endpoint. Warning: This endpoint is in beta and is subject to minor but possibly backwards-incompatible changes.
        Parameters:
        sharedFolderId - The ID for the shared folder. sharedFolderId must match pattern "[-_0-9a-zA-Z:]+" and not be null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any argument does not meet its preconditions.
        DbxSharing.RelinquishFolderMembershipException
        DbxException
